Description:
Modern home full of charm.
Located in a quiet court surrounded by family homes, this exquisite brick build is sure to impress.
Oozing elegance and style throughout, the home has been constructed with the desire to be functional for a large family while also adding a touch of glamour and creating a high level of comfort.
With magnolias and pear trees to greet you upon arrival, the wide foyer sets the standard with the beautiful, French oak timber flooring and high ceilings.
The functional flow of the home will suit any family and draws you through to the open, light-filled kitchen, dining and living area.
The modern kitchen is an entertainer's delight with Caesarstone benchtops, large breakfast bar with waterfalls on each end, an abundance of cupboard and bench space, quality stainless steel appliances, extra-large fridge nook, and butler's pantry with power points galore, further cupboard and bench space and a home for the wine fridge.
The large dining area overlooks both the main living area and the beautiful outdoor entertaining area.
The grand, master suite vaunts two, large walk-in robes with amazing cabinetry and a lustrous ensuite with double vanity, 900mm shower and separate toilet.
A perfect oasis for the kids, the children's wing features three, great-sized bedrooms with built-in robes, a large library with built-in bookshelves and cabinetry ideal as a rumpus or study area, and the beautifully-appointed main bathroom with oversized, deep bath and separate toilet with personal vanity.
The home also features a separate formal lounge perfect for a parents retreat, a large, practical laundry with oodles of storage, cupboard and bench space.
The outdoor entertaining area will delight with café blinds and fans, a magnificent blue stone retaining wall lined with screening pittosporums, and a wealth of grassed area.
Boasting a wide street frontage, the approx. 880sqm block includes a double garage with additional workshop for further storage, and side access with concrete slab to allow for a trailer, caravan or boat.
Additional features include wide driveway for extra parking, full security system featuring eight cameras and internal visual panel, tinted windows throughout, evaporative cooling and central heating, quality fixtures and fittings, and much more.
Be sure not to miss out on this exclusive, custom-built home and contact Jesse Forbes on 0477 277 600 today.

Description:
BRIGHT, BREEZY AND BEAUTIFUL
Modern, low-maintenance home in immaculate condition will appeal to a range of buyers from first homeowners, downsizers or investors.
It offers light-filled interiors beginning with open-plan living, dining and kitchen areas enhanced by gas ducted heating and split system heating and cooling.
Serve up culinary delights in the well-equipped kitchen with electric oven and cook top, Fisher & Paykel dishwasher and pantry.
The main bedroom overlooking front gardens offers a walk-in robe and ensuite while the second bedroom makes the perfect guest suite beside the bathroom and toilet. The third bedroom, quietly tucked away at the back, doubles as a study if desired.
Enjoy alfresco dining under a covered outdoor living area where you can relish the evening breezes, watch remarkable sunsets or just listen to the birdsong.
Embraced by secure fencing and easy care landscaping, the approx. 465m² lot includes a large garden shed and double garage with auto door, rear roller door and direct access to the residence.
Situated in a peaceful, recently developed estate, the property is conveniently close to Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Big Hill Primary School and being on the Melbourne side of Kangaroo Flat, it enjoys quick access to the airport etc.
There's absolutely nothing to do here but move in, unpack the boxes and enjoy a relaxed, easy lifestyle from day one.

Description:
Picture Perfect!
This beautifully presented home is located in a quiet elevated position capturing views back towards Bendigo. Having recently been repainted throughout, this house has a bright and airy atmosphere. With a formal sitting area and a large open plan kitchen dining and family room this house feels spacious. Out from the family room is a large covered pergola and terraced gardens. With privacy screens and clever plant choices, this is a private haven.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with built in robe and ensuite
Two separate living areas
Built in robes 2 bedrooms
Ducted gas heating
Ducted evaporative air conditioning
Outside Features:
Double garage with auto door
Secure fencing
Large alfresco for entertaining
Positioned within a few minutes to Shopping complexes, cafes, public transport, parks and schools this home is what you have been waiting for!

Description:
Lovely 3 Bedroom Home On A Large 977m2 Allotment
This modern sandstone brick is a lovely hoe with colonial windows and wrap around verandah.
Nice updates in the home are modern stainless steel wall oven and trendy timber flooring.
Other features are multi programmable dishwasher, cafe cupboard, ceiling fan and fitted robes.
Living and dining is open plan to maximise space and natural light. Bedrooms area carpeted and the family bathroom includes a separate shower.
Those wanting some extra space have a fabulous 977 square metre block for work and play.
The property includes a huge undercover outdoor living area, as well as side access for your trailer or caravan.
A special bonus at the property is a powered work-shed with its very own front verandah and tradies's toilet .
Priced to sell with vacant possession available and genuine subdivision potential (STCA).
A great place to live, Kangaroo Flat has major shopping outlets plus excellent schools and services

Description:
Opportunity to secure a lovely home on a large block (955m2)
- Fabulous entry home to the Bendigo property market
- Stylish facade, lovely street appeal and excellent 1/4 acre block
- Amazing lounge size, perfect for the family/theatre room or a multitude of purposes
- Offering three good size bedrooms with Birs, master with split system
- Outdoor entertainment area that is elevated with views
- Some very nice features e.g. polished timber floors, dado boards
- Large workshop with power and concrete floor plus single carport
- Only a few minutes walk to the shopping centre for Kangaroo Flat, bus, train and all amenities
- Excellent opportunity for the first home buyers wanting a nice home on a fantastic block
This lovely home is ready to move in, it has huge potential for some cosmetic changes and your investment in the current hot property market is secured. A huge plus is the large block, godd workshop and the CBD and train being walking distance from the home.

Description:
Family Home At Forest Lake
Only a short stroll from Forest Lake, this home will have you feeling welcome the minute you step inside the door. Although, even with such a stunning interior, it certainly invites impressive outdoor living!
Lounge and living rooms are well-separated by a study, meals area and an exquisite kitchen. It features 900mm stove, dishwasher, pot-drawers, breakfast bar amongst marble-look benches and superb cabinetry. An immense walk-in pantry can conceal bulk storage and small appliances.
There's a sizeable laundry, substantial family bathroom with shower, ensuite and walk-in robe to main bedroom plus built-in robes to the other 2 bedrooms. Connected to NBN, on solar power to minimise energy expenses, with split system air conditioning for seasonal climate control, it's got convenience and comfort covered too. Ample rooftop storage is accessible via a drop-down ladder in the man hole.
Serenity and semi-rural scenery greets party-goers and those that simply gather to relax upon the vast decking under the 'Vergola' roof. Mature native trees along the boundary rest against a backdrop of more soaring eucalypts, as no rear neighbours impede privacy. Surrounding fernery, fishpond, hen-house and garden shed on concrete, the big backyard is fully fenced. In the front yard, a double carport and attractive landscaping complete the package.
Close to school, college and walking trails through the State Forest, it's also near a bus route taking travellers into Bendigo and to local amenities.
So when the swans swim past with their cygnets next nesting season, will it be you seeing them on your daily stroll with the family, just 300 metres from your door?
Internal area
145m²

Description:
Peaceful And Picture Perfect
Repainted and refurbished, this immaculate classic property simply exudes serenity from every corner. Not an inch unkempt, it allows its next owners to merely move-in and relax, or prepare for the house-warming party.
A kaleidoscope of colourful flora hugs winding paths through well-groomed peaceful gardens where long established fruit trees, shrubs and lawn thrive. Encircling the sheltered paved barbeque area, they also provide picturesque vistas for indoor dwellers.
At the centre of the home are 2 inviting living/dining zones, either side of a perfectly appointed kitchen with walk-in pantry. A dishwasher and electric cooking appliances have been fitted amongst beautiful cabinetry that incorporate pot drawers. Built-in robes are found in all 4 bedrooms, but the king-size master also possesses an enviable ensuite. Spa with twin headrests, double vanity and separate toilet ensure parental stress disappears here. Solar hot water saves energy, whilst electric floor heating plus refrigerated heating and cooling guarantee constant comfort.
Oversized for extra storage, room for trailer and workshop, the garage has single roller door, concrete floor, power and attached double carport. Storeroom and rainwater tank in the backyard are further bonuses.
Kids can take a shortcut to nearby school and college via Freeman Drive. Medical amenities, shopping and train station are all very close too. Near the Calder Highway, plus with a bus stop around the corner taking travellers into Bendigo and Lansell Square every 30 minutes, it's an incredibly convenient location for commuters too.
Internal area
193m²

Description:
Peaceful And Picture Perfect
Repainted and refurbished, this immaculate classic property simply exudes serenity from every corner. Not an inch unkempt, it allows its next owners to merely move-in and relax, or prepare for the house-warming party.
A kaleidoscope of colourful flora hugs winding paths through well-groomed peaceful gardens where long established fruit trees, shrubs and lawn thrive. Encircling the sheltered paved barbeque area, they also provide picturesque vistas for indoor dwellers.
At the centre of the home are 2 inviting living/dining zones, either side of a perfectly appointed kitchen with walk-in pantry. A dishwasher and electric cooking appliances have been fitted amongst beautiful cabinetry that incorporate pot drawers. Built-in robes are found in all 4 bedrooms, but the king-size master also possesses an enviable ensuite. Spa with twin headrests, double vanity and separate toilet ensure parental stress disappears here. Solar hot water saves energy, whilst electric floor heating plus refrigerated heating and cooling guarantee constant comfort.
Oversized for extra storage, room for trailer and workshop, the garage has single roller door, concrete floor, power and attached double carport. Storeroom and rainwater tank in the backyard are further bonuses.
Kids can take a shortcut to nearby school and college via Freeman Drive. Medical amenities, shopping and train station are all very close too. Near the Calder Highway, plus with a bus stop around the corner taking travellers into Bendigo and Lansell Square every 30 minutes, it's an incredibly convenient location for commuters too.
Internal area
193m²

Address: 85 Kangaroo Gully Road Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Lifestyle Property In Kangaroo Flat!
Set on approx. one and quarter acres is this great lifestyle property, only minutes from Kangaroo Flat Centro Plaza shopping centre is this semi-rural lifestyle. If you are looking for a change of pace in your life then this will suit. This property offers more than the average, open the front door and immediately you will feel the warmth of the beautiful polished floorboards will invite you into the home.
Offers; 4 bedrooms, main with WIR and ensuite, 3 of the bedrooms are larger than the normal.
Formal lounge, a fantastic open plan kitchen-meals-family area, functional kitchen with plenty of bench space and overlooks the beautiful family area with stunning polished floorboards and wood heating, kitchen-meals area also large in size and leads onto awesome entertaining area. Add to the list; large 3 pce bathroom, large laundry, ducted heating and cooling, this home is a delight to inspect internally, but open the sliding doors to externally and more WOW factors! Large undercover entertaining area overlooks the 7m x 2.8m inground pool, this area is all complimented with structured easy-care garden. Add also to the extensive WOW factors is the double garage with remote control PLUS; behind the Colorbond fencing is so much more for this great lifestyle for space, a 4 car garage fully lined with power, concrete floor and split system air-conditioning, PLUS another 4 car garage with concrete floor and power, plus a single carport, all this vehicle accommodation is what you need if you have the boat, caravan, trailer, truck or anything else that needs space, there is side access to all of these. Theres 50,000 litres of tank water & also a dam at the rear of the property, and if you want to have some chooks, grow some vegies there is plenty of space to do so. So, overall this property will impress you, if its time to move out and enjoy some space then this property is the one for you.

Description:
Central and Modern in the Heart of Kangaroo Flat
Beyond the front door of this solid 70s brick façade you will find an outstanding, fully renovated home. Every possible element has been included in this property, where modern timber features are complemented with a neutral colour palette throughout. This home is positioned in a prime location only meters to Kangaroo Flat train station, shopping precinct and leisure centre. The property features:
Three spacious bedrooms, main with walk behind robe and ensuite
Bedroom two features a large walk in robe, with the third bedroom having built in robes and a home office space
Open plan dining and kitchen with new appliances, ample storage, bench space and breakfast bar
Light filled spacious lounge room
Wall furnace heating and ducted evaporative cooling
Main bathroom with timber feature vanity, shower over bath and toilet
Oversized laundry with plenty of bench and linen storage space
Manicured lawns with lovely feature trees in front and back yards
Covered back porch with third toilet, adjacent to the back patio area
9m x 6m (approximate) shed with double auto roller doors, workshop space, power and concrete floor. Access to back yard through double gates
This well-built beauty has been transformed to a modern family home. Move in and enjoy all this property has to offer, where the attention to detail is astonishing. Contact us for more information or to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Attention First Homeowners and Investors!
Take advantage and finally make your break into the market with the $20,000 first homeowner's grant & stamp duty savings or make it the perfect opportunity to invest in Bendigo's expanding real estate market with an outstanding rental return.
Offering 2 brand new quality-built Langdon Building townhouses both with 3 large bedrooms & 2 luxury bathrooms, and a 6-star energy rating.
Here's your chance to be part of an exclusive community that delivers a superior standard of living. Construction is underway and you will be able to move into your new home by the end of 2019.
Built to a high standard, each home will be fully landscaped, fenced, letterbox installed, have blinds throughout, tiled hallways and wet areas plus a gorgeous landscaped retention basin around the entire sides of the properties and all driveways with night-lighting.
With fantastic proportions, these homes will not disappoint both equipped with gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, open plan kitchen, living & dining floor plans and with lock-up garages that have additional storage.
Filled abundantly with natural light, occupants of these remarkable homes will also enjoy a peaceful lifestyle whilst still close to all of Kangaroo Flat's amenities including Lansell Plaza, the new aquatic centre, Crusoe Reservoir and a short 5-minute drive to Bendigo's thriving CBD.
Enquire today to secure one of these super stylish Townhouses!!

Description:
A Gardeners Delight
Four bedrooms plus 5th bedroom/office with toilet, hand basin and external entrance attached to the large double garage.
Located on a private, quiet 2000 sqm block is this beautifully presented 4/5 bedroom home. All bedrooms have large built in robes, the master with en-suite and double built in robes.
The kitchen features an abundance of cupboards, ample bench space and a duel fuel 90cm SMEG cooker. There is also a gas wall oven for extra entertaining.
The attractive living/dining/kitchen area features a large combustion wood heater and a gas wall heater for cosy winter living, with evaporative and reverse cycle air conditioning for summer comfort.
A separate lounge room with feature electric wall heater and adjoining dining room complete the home.
There is a large undercover entertaining patio/veranda all set in lovely established gardens, fully enclosed with colorbond fencing.
In the rear section of the property is a 50m x 20m shed with power and concrete floor, work benches and shelving and a 2.5kw solar power system. A 22700 litre water tank, orchard of peaches, nectarines, apricots, blood plum, orange and lemon trees, raised vege garden beds and a compost system complete the perfect picture.
Insights: 12 Cobb Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.
